channel.title: New Command for everyone!
channel.description:
In my server i have a treasure chest that lets u log into admin zone for easier teleporting i am wanting to make a command that will tell all the players with admin rights were it is when they login how would i do this
the command would start like this please edit and post back
[code] else if (command.startsWith("logineasier") && (playerRights >= 3)) [/code]

item.title: New Command for everyone!
item.dc:creator: @system system
item.description:
@system wrote:

i know
add it under what the admins see

Read full topic

item.title: New Command for everyone!
item.dc:creator: @mjstar mjstar
item.description:
@mjstar wrote:

[quote=“i blkwolf i, post:2, topic:113254”]Code:
sendQuest("@dbl@all players go to etc add that “, (add this after last and put the number that comes after it in this gap);[/quote]
but i want only the admins to be able to see it[br][size=1]Posted on: June 19, 2007, 01:01:21 AM[/size][hr][quote=“mjstar”][quote author=i blkwolf i link=topic=161946.msg1516803#msg1516803 date=1182254183]
Code:
sendQuest(”@dbl@all players go to etc add that ", (add this after last and put the number that comes after it in this gap);
[/quote]
but i want only the admins to be able to see it[/quote]

could i do it like this PlayerHandler.messageToAdmins = "Teleto: “+playerName+” has teleported "+p.playerName+ “to them”;

Read full topic
